alert.note: Alert for Northern Berkshire; Southern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 5:40AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Locally Dense Fog This Morning... Fog has been developing along the river valleys of eastern New York and western New England this morning. Fog has been especially thick within the immediate Hudson and Hoosic Valleys in eastern New York, West and Connecticut River Valleys in southern Vermont and the Housatonic River Valley in western Massachusetts and northwestern Connecticut. Visibility is under one half mile at times, which may lead to hazardous traveling conditions. If you are planning on traveling early this morning, be prepared for areas of fog and changing visibility. The fog should begin dissipating towards the mid-morning hours.
